content.prompt: Which of the following statements best describes the function of the passage’s final paragraph?

choices.label: It restates the author’s thesis in a way that is designed to engage his audience’s attention.
It answers an earlier objection to the author’s argument.
It exhorts the audience to avoid making assumptions about strangers.
It examines the significance of the author’s argument in a broader cultural context.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
